name: 101-in-1 Games 2: Evolution
description:
101 games in different genres in one app!

101-in-1 Games series are back with a brand new collection of games in HD quality. We made sure that all popular genres are present in this collection, therefore you will find everything that you could think of here: racing games, puzzle games, space shooters, match-3, strategy, action, and many many more. Plus some of the games have multiplayer on one device feature, so you can play with your friends and family. And for the first time in 101-in-1 Games history, we have fully integrated social networks, so now you can challenge your friends and beat their scores.

More than 40 million people already play the 101-in-1 Games series, so hop in! We are sure that you will find something for yourself!

* Subscribe to www.youtube.com/Nordcurrent for new videos and trailers!
* Join us at www.facebook.com/Nordcurrent to participate in our competitions, win prizes and have fun!
